channel.title: Os on Hello World
channel.description: Recent content in Os on Hello World

item.title: OS
item.description: CentOS 6/7 Multi-Boot Setup Bootable usb preparation Download dvd iso from url or torrent Use Win32 Image Writer to create usb. ( Bootice is useful tool to reformat the USB as origin ) Install CentOS on virtual machine Before you install, you are better to backup anything on the device which you are going to install, and chcek your internet is working properly. CentOS provide a friendly and nice installation process.
